View On Teletraan1.net

Stim Shock

  1. What happens to Stim Shock when the Bold has been reduced to zero, for example by Oppress? [Source: Aequitas]
    If Stim Shock is revealed and an enemy character has had its Bold reduced to 0, it still has Bold. Stim Shock will still do 1 damage to it.
